show_name: Youkai Watch Jam: Youkai Gakuen Y - N to no Souguu
other_title: 妖怪ウォッチJam 妖怪学園Y Nとの遭遇
opening_theme: #1: "Gingira Ginga (ギンギラ銀河)" by Strawberry Prince (すとぷり) (eps 1-28)
#2: "Dai Uchuu Rendezvous (大宇宙ランデブー)" by Strawberry Prince (すとぷり) (eps 29-??)
ending_theme: #1: "Umarekawattemo (生まれ変わっても)" by Kana Nozomihara (Kana Hanazawa) (ep 1)
#2: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Waiwai-hen (Y学園へ行こう ワイワイ編)" by Lon (ろん) (eps 2, 6, 11, 17, 22, 28, 33)
#3: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Shisou-hen (Y学園へ行こう 疾走編)" by 96neko (96猫) (eps 3, 7, 12, 18, 23, 29, 36)
#4: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Seishun Rock-hen (Y学園へ行こう 青春ロック編)" by +α/Arukifakyun (+α/あるふぁきゅん。) (eps 4, 9, 13, 19, 26)
#5: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Gakuen Dotabata-hen (Y学園へ行こう 学園ドタバタ編)" by Riinu (Strawberry Prince) [莉犬 (すとぷり)] (eps 5, 10, 15, 21, 24, 30, 32)
#6: "Return to Chikyuu (リターントゥ地球)" by Haruka Tomatsu (eps 8, 16, 25, 35, 38)
#7: "Y Gakuen e Ikou 8bit-hen (Y学園へ行こう 8bit編)" by Soraru (eps 14, 20, 27, 31)
#8: "Shinryaku Mashoujo Eruzemekia (侵略魔少女エルゼメキア)" by Eruzemekia (P Maru-sama.) [エルゼメキア (P丸様。)] (ep 34)
#9: "Kiraboshi Kyouwakoku Kokka (キラボシ共和国国歌)" by Sona Yamamoto, Hana Kogane, Tamaki Kumata, Kenshin Kobayashi and Dazaifu Housewife Choir "ODEN" (eps 39-41)
